author: kkolinko
msg: Add javadoc for AbstractReplicatedMap ctr parameters added in r1589637
In Tomcat 7 and 8 this feature is controlled via "terminateOnStartFailure" option of BackupManager.
In Tomcat 6 this option is not used, it remains with the default value of 'true'.
